backend/main.mo: Defines a contact message type, stores messages in a list, and exposes a submitMessage function that appends new messages with timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI/theme-related features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling details of various frontend components, sections, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML document setting up metadata, fonts, and the root element for loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering navbar, all portfolio sections, gradient background shapes, footer, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution text with an accent-colored heart icon and link to caffeine.ai.
Responsive navbar with scroll-based active section tracking, smooth-scroll navigation, and a gradient-accent contact CTA.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Reusable layout wrapper that applies consistent spacing, titles, subtitles, and container structure for sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmit.ts: Hook providing a submitMessage function that calls the backend actor and manages submission loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUpOnView.ts: Hook that animates a count-up effect when an element enters view using IntersectionObserver and easing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing as React Query hooks aren't needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes plus utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/sections/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the About section with professional summary, education details, and career vision using styled cards.
frontend/src/sections/CertificationsSect: Displays a single certification card within a styled section layout.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via custom hook, and displays contact information links.
Shows a timeline-style list of professional experiences with achievements using cards and badges.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the hero section with animated metrics, skill strip, scroll navigation, resume download logic, and layered gradient/dotted backgrounds.
frontend/src/sections/ProjectsSection.ts: Displays featured analytics projects using cards with icons, descriptions, highlights, and tool badges.
frontend/src/sections/SkillsSection.tsx: Shows categorized skill groups using cards with icons and badges for technical abilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s redesign goals, constraints, known issues, and existing feature records for the portfolio site.
